website_summaries.verdict: A top choice if you need a reusable snack bag that will keep goodies fresher for longer. The only insulated snack bag on our list.
pros: Has an insulated lining to help maintain temperature and freshness
Dishwasher safe with curved corners for easy cleaning
Zipper is manageable for little hands
Features a hanging loop for hands-free carrying
cons: Compact size might work best for younger kids and toddlers than adults

customer_reviews.title: great as snack bags for school
customer_reviews.text: Our kids school used to provide snacks but with Covid they are now asking that the kids bring their own. They don't have room in their lunch boxes for AM and PM snacks so I purchased these. They are GREAT! Easy to clean, has a little handle so on days they don't bring backpacks to school they can just put them on their wrist to bring into their classroom. I would for sure recommend! Really cute prints too!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Not insulated...just a regular pouch.
customer_reviews.text: No clue why its advertised as insulated when it's obviously not.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunches or diaper bags!
customer_reviews.text: We love this snack bag for our 1.5 year old and use it almost daily for outings to bring snacks and lunches. It's perfect to throw in a bag and not worry about food pouches or liquids exploding everywhere, or staying cold. We love that it's dishwasher safe and can be used time and time again, no more plastic bags!
customer_reviews.author: emily hagman

customer_reviews.title: not very much insulation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pouch to keep a soft gel icepack and a hard-sided ice block in. I carry these with me for my arthritis pain. It was disappointing because the walls of the pouch are very thin, and did little to keep these items cold. It also is completely flat. If you put items in that have thickness, it takes up a lot of the length and width of the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag. I wished it was in smaller sizes. It was too big for what I needed it for. I gave to my niece. She loves it for snacks for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa kb

customer_reviews.title: cute but small
customer_reviews.text: cute, reusable bags for snacks. They are super cute prints and I love the material and how easy it is to wash. If i had one complaint it would be that the small bag is very small and doesn't fit much but it is perfect for bringing a little treat like mini chocolate chips or marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my son the whole school year, well until this pandemic. It’s easy to use, looks great and he loves the design
customer_reviews.author: WildFly

customer_reviews.title: Did not use, probably not insulated.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. I don't believe it was really insulated. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: sugarkooky

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and durable. Perfect for snacks, small toys and other little items!
customer_reviews.author: Mom3103

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: The inside molded after 2 weeks of use . Even with cleaning in between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and reusable which is what I am looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lina Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are a cute way to tote around snacks for the little one. I like that I’m not using loads of disposable plastic bags. They feel like they are a really good quality. I think the value for the money is worth it. These were easy to wash. I got these for myself, but would also consider them giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Britt WT

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I have used this reusable bag almost daily since receiving it a few weeks ago. The material is sturdy and it is large enough to fit most of my 4 year old's lunch. The handle is convenient as well. It is very easy to clean and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LinBMcC

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Loves these sturdy and functional bags, makes packing lunch a breeze. Easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Olson

product_meta.title: green sprouts Insulated Reusable Snack Bag | Keeps Food Fresh | Insulated Layer, Food-Safe, Waterproof & Easy-Clean Material, Aqua Pirate
product_meta.description: Color:Aqua PirateKeep food fresh on the go with the Reusable Insulated Snack Bag with zipper closure. The durable, waterproof material and curved corners are easy to clean, and the insulated layer helps maintain food temperature. Perfect for baby or toddler, the reusable snack pouches include a convenient name label for daycare, preschool, and travel. The sandwich size bag replaces disposable plastic baggies to help save money and create less waste, and the hanging loop handle allows for hands-free carrying on a stroller or bag.
feature_bullets: Inner lining protects food from direct contact with waterproof layer
Insulated layer helps maintain food temperature

specifications.Care instructions: Clean before first use and after each use. Hand wash or wipe clean with damp cloth. Dishwasher safe
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
